Uses of Package
org.phantomapi.event

  • Packages that use org.phantomapi.event 
    Package Description
    org.phantomapi.core
    The core set of controllers phantom uses to host the framework
    org.phantomapi.event
    Events phantom has added to bukkits event system
    org.phantomapi.hud
    Ingame huds with holograms
    org.phantomapi.pet  
    org.phantomapi.ppa
    Send and receive information through servers without the need of bungeecord or online players
    org.phantomapi.util
    The most useful package.
    org.phantomapi.world
    World wrappers, async utilities, object representations and so much more.
